remarks: A subspace topology is a topology.  Definition of subspace topology in [Munkres] p. 89. ` A ` is normally a subset of the base set of ` J ` . (Contributed by FL, 15-Apr-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.)
statement: resttop $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A e. V ) -> ( J |`t A ) e. Top ) $.
